Webinar: Successful Test Automation for Avaloq at LGT
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Testing within the banking sector is usually risky and tedious. However, an automated test case portfolio with high test coverage of a core banking system can help you to start testing within the banking sector with less risks and less headaches. Join our webinar as we reveal a real Tricentis Tosca Testsuite project of a bank that uses Avaloq. The webinar will demonstrate how Tosca manages to steer Avaloq and how synthetic test data is used in a successful implementation of an automation test case portfolio. Finally a short Tosca demo will show how an automated test case really works in Avaloq.
Specific topics covered in the webinar include:
- A short introduction of LGT Bank - Tosca test automation in Avaloq – how it works - The process of a Tosca test project in the banking sector - Changing the test process - Usage of synthetic test data - Results and outcome - Tosca demo of an automated Avaloq test case
We look forward to seeing you at our webinar! Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
